item.title: Demo
Demo
Devlog
item.description: 2022-03-02 I laid out the general interface architecture. Each “chunk” in a structure has its own editing context, or set of permissible operations on the artifact the chunk represents. A STARK terminal provides human and network interfaces. The human interface allows the individual using the program to dispatch operations, while the network interface receives and dispatches operations from other terminals. The human interface includes input device mappings and graphical elements as needed, which ease access to permitted operations.

item.title: Documentation
